nodes.text: Attis Station was a research facility located on the poisonous planet of Quesh. During the Cold War in the year of 3643 BBY, the research lab was attacked by Imperial forces, and the scientists and personnel were captured and held hostage. Fortunately for them, the newly appointed Barsen'thor arrived, and with assistance from Nadia Grell, managed to defeat the Sith threat, and save a large majority of the staff. The facility had two floors, as well as testing rooms.
Attis Station appears in the 2011 BioWare MMORPG Star Wars: The Old Republic as a primary location on Quesh.
